alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 26 at 2:39PM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow shower will continue. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills continued. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Admiralty Inlet Area, including Port Townsend, Whidbey Island, and Camano Island and Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca lowlands, including Port Angeles, Sequim, and Blyn. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM PST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca
